title: Happy!
author: JGray
text:
I hope everyone to whom this statement applies had a happy holiday. I hope everyone else had a good weekend! I spent the weekend with my folks, out in the woods. I managed not to get too badly eaten by dinosaur sized mosquitoes.

Color will be coming a little later today. The holiday has delayed us some.

Who do you think is telepathically talking to Chrys?

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: 5 gets ya 10 it's her father Quest. Would help explain who Mork was talking too whe  he sold our pretties out.

replies.author: Ketira*Guest*
replies.text: Hm... maybe.  My guess is Circe; since no one knows just how powerful she is, I think this is possible.

replies.author: Ghost*Guest*
replies.text: Mehh for some reason I'm more inclined to lean towards it been mandrake, and yes I am aware of her normal speech been the images but it could be a side effect of whatever the heck she did to disappear. *grasps for more straws*

replies.author: Ariaflame*Guest*
replies.text: Was that the start of  a Princess Bride quote there?

replies.author: JGray
replies.text: Very good eye, Ariaflame.

replies.author: Alice*Guest*
replies.text: Damn, someone beat me to it. I LOVE the Princess Bride and immediately recougnised the reference hehehe
